Vayne is not easy to play although she is good right now.

Honestly her skill floor is decently low (meaning you don't have to have much skill to be able to play her) she just has a massively high skill cap.

It's like lee sin, any pleb can play vayne, only the good ones can stomp with her.

Well using her ultimate properly to juke opponents does take a lot of skill and also vayne condemn is also fairly difficult to use when u first start playing her. Other than that positioning with vayne is very important because she is a lot more squishy than most other adcs.
I personally absolutely suck at her so I don't recommend her to others especially if they don't think they're good at ADCs lol.
Kindred and Vayne :P

Tristana or Jinx are the easiest. Most their damage comes from simply right clicking and pressing R occasionally.

Easy "good" Junglers: Gragas, Reksai (both build tank - I prefer tank reksai over AD), Shyvanna is also pretty good and easy.

Warwick and Xin Zhao are also extremely easy, but not necessarily "good". They are playable though
No dude I'm a mid lane main, I'm not used to champs who just right click and require kiting. Should I have some casters ADs a go?
Then play Ezreal. You can play him AP mid or ADC. So he is useful to learn.
A caster that kite well ? try Lucian

If you suck at ADC try caster type ones like graves or ezreal, that way you can still be effective even if you're not getting off as many aa's as you should be.

For jungle my main suggestion would be to stay away from devourer junglers, if you're not good at managing your time and being in the right place you will fall very far behind and be much less useful than if you'd gone warrior or cinderhulk. Some simple stuff that comes to mind is skarner, pantheon, amumu, vi, and I'm sure there's plenty of others.

For ADC I think Tristana's the easiest..
Her Basics deal splash damage on killing a minion so it makes it easier to CS.. I often get multiple CS when I only go for one.
Basically all you need to know for her is you E on someone (bomb them) then Q (attack speed boost) and go to town on them.
If they try to escape you W (rocket jump) after their bussy. On the other hand if things go badly you rocket jump away from them, or if that's down you can always just ult them the hell away and casually walk off.
Also your W resets on kills/assists so if they're all low you can just jump from champ to champ killing them all..

For Jungle, who do you usually top lane as? When I'm stuck with JG I pick Tryndamere or Yi since I have a lot of experience with him in the top lane and they both jungle well.
